title: Sacrifice
description: A Dystopian Romance .  Anelia Grace Tallow was born the princess an Opposition that is staunchly against the rise of regulation and uniformity. Among all things, she and her people value freedom, choice, and hope. Nelia is thrust into the position of a leader when her father suddenly dies, and struggles to find her leadership style, and to make her people proud. Nestled deep in the arms of people with like minds and beliefs, bonded together by the memory of her father, his leadership, and the Cause that they support to the death, she never had reason to question her safety, or her position.  That is, until the Crown Prince of Civilization crosses all boundaries to steal her away and force her fate.  Torn between the desires of her heart and the duties of her position, Nelia is forced to make a choice that could turn her entire world upside down.
author: Monique Cashaw
